name: Heather Meglasson
what_you_do: Heather Meglasson is an impact artist, speaker, and author who creates expressive art and hosts events focused on personal growth and transformation.
who_you_serve: Heather serves a community that is willing to step into something a little bit shocking but also find safe support and camaraderie.
seeking: The website does not explicitly state what partnerships or collaborations Heather is actively looking for.
social_proof: Heather has been featured in notable media outlets, is a bestselling author, and has a large social media following.
signature_programs: Heather offers a spoken word piece called "Dear We and the Full House of Doubt- A Motivational Spoken Word Piece" and has created a documentary project called "Shadowdance Journey".
business_focus: Heather Meglasson creates expressive art and hosts events focused on personal growth and transformation.
